div.div:
[int][new][bt] Resolve compilation errors
Project: SiFliSDK
redmine: #4160, REDMINE-4160
ext-redmine: bug|feat#id
[Description in detail]
Affected branch: [main]
Change-Id: Ice1b53efdf83d3114b24caddd56bcf132854f404

[int][opt][ble] Make the default value of BSP_BLE_SIBLES false in 55x LCPU
Project: Bluetooth
redmine: #5555, REDMINE-5555
ext-redmine: bug|feat#id
[Description in detail]
Affected branch: [master]
Change-Id: I2f5698e8d3ab133f75759391bfce8a4b148ca498

[int][bug][ble] Fixed over-written problem in serial trans client
Project: Bluetooth
redmine: #5621, REDMINE-5621
ext-redmine: bug|feat#id
[Description in detail] 1. If data in ble_serial_tran_send_data() have bigger length than mtu ,then over-written happened. 2. Add protection if init serial tran client multi times
Affected branch: [master]
Change-Id: I00215eaa1656845350c480a1f8ecc63b3ee87029

[int][bug][ble] Fixed serial trans service register gatt server multi times if init this service multi times
Project: Bluetooth
redmine: #5619, REDMINE-5619
ext-redmine: bug|feat#id
[Description in detail] Add protection if already inited
Affected branch: [master]
Change-Id: I79923b7da1928bc792fbe2e04aad9ae001c033ce

[bug][zbt] Fix BLE audio link issue in GCC environment
redmine: #5146, REDMINE-id

[Description in detail] BLE Audio specific section need to be added to scatter loading in gcc.
